Greetings to grand duke of Luxemburg
articles.content:
Greetings to grand duke of Luxemburg 
    Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, on June 21 sent a message of greetings to Henri, grand duke of Luxemburg, on the occasion of its National Day.
 In the belief that the relations between the two countries would grow stronger in various domains in the future, the message wished him good health and happiness.

Russian delegation here
articles.content:
Russian delegation here
    Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Russian Orthodox Church headed by Archbishop Kliment, first vice-chairman for foreign affairs, arrived here today to participate in a ground-breaking ceremony of an orthodox church to be built in Pyongyang.
 It was greeted at the airport by Ho Il Jin, chairman of the Korean Orthodox Church Committee, and Andrei Karlov, Russian Ambassador here.
